slides.title: Welcome to GST Returns
slides.content:
# GST Returns

Timely filing is **essential for compliance**.

## What You Will Learn

- **Monthly Returns** - GSTR-1, GSTR-3B
- **Annual Return** - GSTR-9
- **Special Returns** - Composition, TDS
- **Compliance** - Due dates and penalties

## Topics

| Area | Focus |
|------|-------|
| GSTR-1 | Outward supply |
| GSTR-3B | Summary |
| GSTR-9 | Annual |
| Penalties | Late filing |

slides.title: GSTR-1 - Outward Supplies
slides.content:
# Outward Supply Details

## Purpose

```
Details of all outward supplies:
- Taxable
- Exempt
- Nil rated
- Non-GST
```

## Due Dates

| Turnover | Frequency | Due Date |
|----------|-----------|----------|
| > Rs 5 Cr | Monthly | 11th |
| < Rs 5 Cr | Monthly | 13th |
| QRMP | Quarterly | 13th |

## Contents

- B2B invoices (with GSTIN)
- B2C large (> Rs 2.5 lakh)
- B2C small (consolidated)
- Credit/Debit notes
- Exports
- Nil rated/exempt

slides.title: GSTR-3B - Summary Return
slides.content:
# Monthly Summary

## Purpose

```
Self-declared summary:
- Outward supplies
- ITC claimed
- Tax payment
```

## Due Dates

| Turnover | Frequency | Due Date |
|----------|-----------|----------|
| > Rs 5 Cr | Monthly | 20th |
| < Rs 5 Cr (Group A) | Monthly | 20th |
| < Rs 5 Cr (Group B) | Monthly | 22nd/24th |
| QRMP | Quarterly | 22nd/24th |

## Tables

| Table | Content |
|-------|--------|
| 3.1 | Outward supplies |
| 3.2 | Interstate supplies |
| 4 | ITC |
| 5 | Exempt/Non-GST |
| 6 | Tax payment |

slides.title: QRMP Scheme
slides.content:
# Quarterly Return Monthly Payment

## Eligibility

| Criterion | Limit |
|-----------|-------|
| Turnover | < Rs 5 Cr |
| Option | Quarterly filing |

## Returns

| Return | Frequency |
|--------|----------|
| GSTR-1 | Quarterly |
| GSTR-3B | Quarterly |
| IFF | Monthly option |

## Monthly Tax Payment

| Method | Basis |
|--------|-------|
| Fixed sum | 35% of last quarter |
| Self-assessment | Actual |

slides.title: GSTR-2A and GSTR-2B
slides.content:
# Inward Supply Statements

## GSTR-2A

```
Dynamic statement:
- Auto-populated from suppliers
- Real-time updates
- Used for reconciliation
```

## GSTR-2B

```
Static statement:
- Generated on 14th
- Fixed for the month
- Used for ITC claim
```

## Usage

| Statement | Use |
|-----------|-----|
| GSTR-2A | Reconciliation |
| GSTR-2B | ITC claim basis |

slides.title: GSTR-9 - Annual Return
slides.content:
# Annual Summary

## Due Date

```
31st December of following FY
```

## Contents

| Part | Details |
|------|--------|
| Part I | Basic details |
| Part II | Outward supplies |
| Part III | ITC |
| Part IV | Tax paid |
| Part V | Transactions (previous FY) |
| Part VI | Other information |

## Who Files

- All regular taxpayers
- Except composition, ISD, casual

slides.title: GSTR-9C - Reconciliation Statement
slides.content:
# Audit Reconciliation

## Applicability

| Turnover | Requirement |
|----------|-------------|
| > Rs 5 Cr | Self-certified |
| < Rs 5 Cr | Not required |

## Contents

```
Reconciliation of:
- GSTR-9 with books
- Tax liability
- ITC

Certified by taxpayer
(earlier by CA/CMA)
```

## Tables

| Table | Reconciliation |
|-------|---------------|
| 5 | Gross turnover |
| 6-8 | Tax and ITC |
| 12-13 | Expenses |
| 14 | Supplies |
| 15-16 | Additional liability |

slides.title: Composition Returns
slides.content:
# CMP-08 and GSTR-4

## CMP-08 (Quarterly)

| Due Date | Purpose |
|----------|--------|
| 18th of following month | Tax payment |

## GSTR-4 (Annual)

| Due Date | Purpose |
|----------|--------|
| 30th April | Annual return |

## Contents

```
- Summary of supplies
- Tax payable
- Inward supplies (reverse charge)
```

slides.title: TDS and TCS Returns
slides.content:
# Special Categories

## GSTR-7 (TDS)

| Filer | Due Date |
|-------|----------|
| TDS deductor | 10th |

## GSTR-8 (TCS)

| Filer | Due Date |
|-------|----------|
| E-commerce operator | 10th |

## Contents

| Return | Information |
|--------|-------------|
| GSTR-7 | TDS deducted, payment |
| GSTR-8 | TCS collected, payment |

slides.title: Late Fees and Interest
slides.content:
# Non-Compliance Costs

## Late Fees

| Return | Fee |
|--------|-----|
| GSTR-3B (with tax) | Rs 50/day |
| GSTR-3B (nil) | Rs 20/day |
| GSTR-1 | Rs 50/day |
| GSTR-9 | Rs 200/day |

## Caps

| Return | Maximum |
|--------|--------|
| GSTR-3B | Rs 10,000 |
| GSTR-1 | Rs 10,000 |
| GSTR-9 | 0.25% of turnover |

## Interest

```
18% per annum on late tax payment
24% on wrong ITC utilization
```

slides.title: Return Amendments
slides.content:
# Correcting Errors

## Amendment Period

```
Amendments allowed until:
- 30th November of following FY
- Or filing of annual return
```

## Methods

| Error | Correction |
|-------|------------|
| B2B invoice | Amendment tables |
| B2C | In subsequent return |
| Missing | In current return |

## Limitations

- No revision of filed returns
- Only amendment in subsequent

## Quarterly

| Date | Return |
|------|--------|

| 22nd/24th | GSTR-3B (QRMP) |

## Annual

| Date | Return |
|------|--------|
| 31st Dec | GSTR-9, 9C |
